program codeforces_146_A
  implicit none
  integer :: n, x, y, t, i
  character(len=200) :: str

  ! Reading the input
  read *, n
  read (*,'(a)') str

  t = 0
  ! Checking if all characters are '4' or '7'
  do i = 1, n
    if (str(i:i) /= '4' .and. str(i:i) /= '7') then
      t = 1
      exit
    end if
  end do

  if (t == 1) then
    print *, 'NO'
  else
    x = 0
    y = 0

    ! Summing first half
    do i = 1, n/2
      x = x + ichar(str(i:i)) - ichar('0')
    end do

    ! Summing second half
    do i = (n/2)+1, n
      y = y + ichar(str(i:i)) - ichar('0')
    end do

    ! Comparing sums
    if (x == y) then
      print *, 'YES'
    else
      print *, 'NO'
    end if
  end if
end program codeforces_146_A
